row.eng: a) a total number of employees less than 100 people, or
row.fra: fr_a) a total number of employees less than 100 people, or

row.eng: b) a total annual gross revenue between $30,000 and $5 million.
row.fra: fr_b) a total annual gross revenue between $30,000 and $5 million.

row.eng: We have completed the Small Business Fee Mitigation Application and attached it with our submission/application.
row.fra: fr_We have completed the Small Business Fee Mitigation Application and attached it with our submission/application.

row.eng: We certify that our organization is a branch or agency of the Government of Canada or of a province or territory
row.fra: fr_We certify that our organization is a branch or agency of the Government of Canada or of a province or territory

row.eng: We certify that our institution is funded by the Government of Canada or the government of a province or territory and that it is
row.fra: fr_We certify that our institution is funded by the Government of Canada or the government of a province or territory and that it is

row.eng: a) licensed, approved or designated by a province in accordance with the laws of the province to provide care or treatment to persons or animals suffering from any form of disease or illness; or
row.fra: fr_a) licensed, approved or designated by a province in accordance with the laws of the province to provide care or treatment to persons or animals suffering from any form of disease or illness; or

row.eng: b) owned or operated by the Government of Canada or the government of a province and that provides health services.
row.fra: fr_b) owned or operated by the Government of Canada or the government of a province and that provides health services.

row.eng: We certify that the drug in our submission/application is on the List of Drugs for an Urgent Public Health Need as per the Access to Drugs in Exceptional Circumstances Regulations AND
row.fra: fr_We certify that the drug in our submission/application is on the List of Drugs for an Urgent Public Health Need as per the Access to Drugs in Exceptional Circumstances Regulations AND

row.eng: a) the drug has the same medicinal ingredient, strength and route of administration, and is in a comparable dosage form, as a drug that may be imported under subsection C.10.001(2) of those Regulations;
row.fra: fr_a) the drug has the same medicinal ingredient, strength and route of administration, and is in a comparable dosage form, as a drug that may be imported under subsection C.10.001(2) of those Regulations;

row.eng: b) no drug identification number has been assigned under section C.01.014.2 of those Regulations for the drug or for another drug that has the same medicinal ingredient, strength and route of administration and is in a comparable dosage form; and
row.fra: fr_b) no drug identification number has been assigned under section C.01.014.2 of those Regulations for the drug or for another drug that has the same medicinal ingredient, strength and route of administration and is in a comparable dosage form; and

row.eng: c) no notice of compliance has been issued under section C.08.004 of those Regulations in respect of the drug or another drug that has the same medicinal ingredient, strength and route of administration and is in a comparable dosage form.
row.fra: fr_c) no notice of compliance has been issued under section C.08.004 of those Regulations in respect of the drug or another drug that has the same medicinal ingredient, strength and route of administration and is in a comparable dosage form.

row.eng: Are any ownership of licenses being transferred
row.fra: fr_Are any ownership of licenses being transferred
